Phillips Neighborhood Updates - Community Bulletin

UPCOMING EVENTS:

1. Block Party on Park Ave
Sometime in mid-June. We're still working out the exact date — watch this space. Last year's was a blast! We had over 200 people and three food trucks.

2. Tenant Rights Workshop
Happening "soon" according to organizers at the Minneapolis Tenant Union. They're finalizing the venue. Likely at Brian Coyle Community Center, 420 15th Ave S. Sign up at tenants@mplstenantunion.org to get notified.

3. Community Garden Plot Lottery
Deadline was last Tuesday (we're sorry if you missed it!). Winners will be notified by the end of the month. Contact garden@phillipsneighborhood.org.

4. Emergency Food Distribution
Every other Wednesday starting the first week of April. Time TBD but probably late morning. Phillips Community Center, 2323 11th Ave S, Minneapolis.

5. Know Your Rights Training
Next week at Sagrado Corazón Church. Exact time and date to be announced on the MIRC Facebook page. This is specifically for community members concerned about recent ICE activity.

For questions about any of these, call the Phillips neighborhood office at 612-555-0199.
